title: Stocks Rise at Start of 2026, Precious Metals Gain: Markets Wrap
description: Stocks kicked off trading in the new year on a positive note with US equity-index futures advancing, while gold and silver gained.
content: Stocks kicked off trading in the new year on a positive note with US equity-index futures advancing, while gold and silver gained.
